entry.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap Votes Against Protocol Fees, RocketPool on zkSync, Easy Uni v3 LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Uniswap DAO Voted Against Protocol Fees The Uniswap DAO voted for zero protocol fees on the GFX Lab’s fee switch proposal. Uniswap's executive director tweeted that the vote is only for gathering feedback and the DAO “will use the polling data to propose a formal Temperate Check”

entry.title: Today in DeFi - unshETH Private Key Leak, EU MiCA Singed, Perps Trading on Polygon zkEVM, and more...
entry.summary: unshETH Private Key Leak One of unshETH deployer’s private keys was compromised and some USH farm rewards and protocol liquidity were compromised. The team paused withdrawals on unshETH Ether and is negotiating with the hackers for a return of lost funds worth 375k. User-deposited funds are safe and unaffected.

entry.title: Today in DeFi -One Click DAOs, tBTC on Arbitrum, zkEVM farming and More
entry.summary: One Click DAOs A new project on Aragon called Libree allows users to quickly and easily create Investment DAOs. Users can easily create asset management strategies and assign permissions to wallets managing funds. tBTC on Arbitrum tBTC, a BTC token on Ethereum, is

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Worldcoin Integrates Safe, Tai.Money Live, LST Loans, and more...
entry.summary: Worldcoin Integrates Safe UBI protocol Worldcoin integrates with Safe to offer account abstraction to its users. World App users receive a Safe-powered smart contract wallet deployed on Polygon. Tai.money Live Tai.money, a version of Reflexer’s RAI that supports LSDs as collateral, is live. Users can now borrow TAI against their ETH, wstETH, rETH, cbETH, and RAI; also users can LP for the protocol to earn

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - QuickPerps on Polygon zkEVM, Fantom Gas Monetization, Multichain Routes Paused, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of May 22nd

entry.title: Today in DeFi - QuickPerps Live on Polygon zkEVM, Lyra Upgrade on Optimism, Vote on Protocol Fees, and more...
entry.summary: QuickPerps Live on Polygon zkEVM QuickSwap launches QuickPerps, a perpetual dex that allows trading of $MATIC, $ETH, $BTC, $USDC, $USDT, and $DAI with up to 50x leverage. Lyra Upgrade on Optimsim Lyra launched an improved version of the protocol on Optimism. The new version uses SNX V2 perpetual futures as a liquidity source to delta hedge the option Market Maker Vaults (MMVs). This improves the capital efficiency of the protocol, increases the percentage of fees returned back to LPs, and allows for more assets to be supported for traders.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Multichain Routes Paused, Matcha DEX Upgrade, TWAP Trading, and more...
entry.summary: Multichain Routes Paused Some bridging routes (Kava、zkSync、Polygon zkEVM) on Multichain are paused and some traders’ funds are stuck on the bridges. There are also unconfirmed rumors of the cofounder's arrest in China and an investor sell-off of its token.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase Cloud WaaS Live, Lukso L1 Live, NFT Loan, and more...
entry.summary: Coinbase Cloud WaaS Live Coinbase Cloud launches Wallet-as-a-Service on the Ethereum mainnet. Coinbase WaaS allows users to manage their wallets using a username & a password, and wallets created with WaaS are secured by multi-party computation (MPC) tech.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Inverse DBR Streaming, Lido Withdrawals UI Live, MEV-less Crosschain Swap, and more...
entry.summary: Inverse DBR Streaming Inverse introduces DBR Streaming, a new utility to INV tokens. Each staked INV will receive an automated, continual stream of DBR. DBRs are tradable borrowing rights used for Inverse’s lending market FiRM Lido Withdrawals UI Live

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Lido V2 Live, crvUSD Live, Tornado Cash DAO Attack, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of May 15th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Perpetuals, X2Y2 Fi and v3, DAI Borrowing, and more...
entry.summary: Aevo Perpetuals Ribbon’s options protocol, Aevo, launches perpetual futures. Users are now able to trade both ETH Options and Perpetual contracts with up to 20x leverage. X2Y2 Fi and v3 Live NFT marketplace X2Y2 launches X2Y2 Fi and the v3 upgrade. The X2Y2 Fi is a platform for NFT loans, and v3 improves the platform UX with new features such as Gasless Loan Offer Cancellation, Optimized Gas Expenditure, and Auto Refinance.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - crvUSD UI Live, Kava v13 Live, Farming on LSDs, and more...
entry.summary: crvUSD UI Live Curve launches the UI for crvUSD. For now, sfrxETH is supported as collateral with stETH coming next. Kava 13 Live Kava 13 is now live. The upgrade speeds up transactions on the network and offers greater security, and brings a new bridge that facilitates the transfer of assets from Cosmos to protocols across Kava.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Reserve hyUSD, Origin OETH, ETH Staking, and more...
entry.summary: Reserve hyUSD Live Reserve Protocol launches hyUSD, a yield-bearing RToken backed by yield-bearing assets that provide exposure to fiat stablecoins and US treasuries through Convex and Flux Finance. Origin OETH Origin protocol launches Origin Ether (OETH)

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lido V2 Live, Rook Transition, Advanced Swapping, and more...
entry.summary: Lido V2 Live Lido v2 is approved and launched. This upgrade mainly enables withdrawals & staking routers. Stakers can now directly unstake their ETH through Lido. Rook Transition Following the approval of KIP-44, Rook DAO is transitioning token governance to Incubator DAO, a new funding project to explore new concepts for the ROOK token.

entry.summary: Recap: Week of May 8th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - The 5 Phases of Maker Endgame, Uniswap on Bitcoin, MEV Profits Sharing, and more...
entry.summary: The 5 Phases of Maker Endgame Maker founder Ruin proposes a 5 phases Endgame plan that will rebrand MKR & DAI, enable SubDAOs, build AI tools, launch governance Participation Rewards, and eventually build Maker’s own chain. Uniswap on Bitcoin Trustless Market

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Cosmos Neutron Live, zkLend Live on Starknet, Boosted LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Cosmos Neutron Live Neutron Chain, the first consumer chain Cosmos’ Replicated Security, is now live. Built using Cosmos SDK, Neutron allows devs to launch smart contracts that can interoperate with other protocols and appchains. zkLend Live on Starknet

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maker Spark Lend, Prime Protocol Mainnet, Trade to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: Maker Spark Lend Maker launched Spark Lend, its new lending product that allows users to lend/borrow ETH, stETH, DAI, and sDAI. Spark Lend is not available for users from the U.S. Prime Protocol Mainnet Prime Protocol is now live on Ethereum, Avalanche, Arbitrum One, and Moonbeam. Prime allows users to borrow cross-chain backed by their entire portfolio of cross-chain assets. Prime also launches an Early Adopter Program that rewards users with points.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Sui Mainnet, 1inch Fusion on Multichain, Lido V2 Coming, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of May 1st

entry.title: Today in DeFi - 1inch Fusion on Multichain, Yearn Dump Services, NFT Lending, and more...
entry.summary: 1inch Fusion on Multichain 1inch now provides Fusion Mode on five more chains including Optimism, Arbitrum, Avalanche, Fantom, and Gnosis Chain. Fusion Mode is 1inch’s feature that enables users to swap tokens on various DEXes without paying network fees and at better rates.
